summary: A small American contingent tries to train rural tribesmen to defend themselves against fanatical Muslim radicals in 1906 Philippines.

Sonkur|Charles Stevens|Kam Tong|John Villasin|Lucio Villegas|Martin Wilkins
keywords: u.s army doctor|moro uprising|philippine constabulary|philippine commonwealth|insurgency
title: La jungla en armas
